duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete physical maintenance visits to apartment units and community facilities after resident requests for assistance has been completed.
Complete routine maintenance visits to all facilities including plumbing, electrical, HVAC, carpentry, painting, appliance repair, and more.
Respond to routine service calls made by employees on their time schedule.
Perform extra duty projects as assigned.
Communicate with Community Manager on any issues or concerns that arise in regards to your role.
Complete daily inventory of equipment and supplies.
Follow written correspondence guidelines with neighbors, management, and outside vendors.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED preferred; or equivalent experience of (3) three to (5) years with a stable work history.
Valid Driver’s License with an acceptable driving record.
